examples: His private life is the subject of much speculation.
Su vida privada es objeto de mucha especulación.
There was widespread speculation that she was going to resign.
Hubo una especulación generalizada de que iba a dimitir.
Today's announcement ends months of speculation about the company's future.
El anuncio de hoy pone fin a meses de especulaciones sobre el futuro de la empresa.
The president’s absence led to speculation over his health.
La ausencia del presidente generó especulaciones sobre su salud.
